entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
